value:
$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|At last! The information I need is
written right here.$k$p"Thus, the kingdom's royalty
came to carry the blood of the
god—and a wicked god it was."$k$p"The god had perished and yet
lived on in this royal bloodline,
worming through its veins."$k$p"Generations of this family were
made into the wicked god's
puppets by blood."$k$p"They were powerless to fight the
corrupt influence that coursed
in their flesh."$k$p"The wicked god has been known
by sundry names."$k$p"Devourer of Royals... Ruin
Borne upon Wings... The Original
Demon..."$k$p"But the god's true name has
never been written until now.
That name is..."$k$pWhat?! The passage ends right
there, just like that?!$k$pTo come all this way to possess
the tome of the hermit Bramimond,
and be denied the details I seek?$k$pThe Dragon's Gate in this world,
found on Valor, opens onto
other worlds.$k$pSo there are those here who may
have seen everything from...
another angle.$k$pBut I must learn more about
my own...my own...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Urghhh...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I must hurry, not just for my sake,
but also Princess Veronica's.$k

$WmMPID_レイヴァン,ch03_09_Leyvan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Now, it's time.$k$p$WmMPID_ルセア,ch03_11_Ruthea_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No, Lord Raven! You mustn't
follow the likes of them. Please,
I beg of you, don't do this.$k$p$WmMPID_レイヴァン,ch03_09_Leyvan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Shut up, Lucius. If I fight for them,
they'll give me the power I need
to get my revenge.$k$pThat's the contract. And that's what
I want. Stay here and be quiet. I'll
return for you.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_レイヴァン,ch03_09_Leyvan_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So now we have no choice but to
run away with our tails between
our legs? Disgusting.$k$pBut I can't fall here. I can't stop
until I get my revenge!$k$Sbs150|
